name: The Troll & the Worm
description:
The Troll & the Worm:

The Troll & the Worm look for clues in the desert valley, and encounter Agony behind a metal shutter that leads to the bottom of a dried well.

This is the first game I ever made, completed in 2019. It likely has scaling bugs depending on the device you are running on (Leave a comment if there are game breaking bugs and I will publish an updated WebGL build for browser).  All models, textures, rigging, animations, scripting, main game music/dialogue and fonts were made from scratch by a tiny version of myself with big dreams. I didn't even know what a texture was at the start of this project, nor had I opened Unity or Blender before. I hope to (with more wisdom) create something I am willing to get this lost in again. Enjoy!

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD: Walk

J: Jump

P: Punch

Click: Interact
